title: Non-linear Teaching Method Design and Application Project for Physical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational physical education theory, introductory teaching methodologies, and project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Projects innovating physical education lesson design by pre-service teachers based on ecological dynamics theory

learning_goals: Core principles of nonlinear pedagogy (exploratory approach, individualized movement solutions) can be applied to physical education classes
A personalized physical education program based on ecological dynamics theory can be designed and implemented
A nonlinear pedagogy-based class evaluation tool accounting for individual differences in students' motor abilities can be developed
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
